channel.title: 317 staff panel
channel.description:
I am looking for someone or some people, who would like to help me code a staff panel. It would be in the music tab, and would not be useable by non-staff. It is a pretty simple concept. All you would do is select an option... (ban, mute, ipban, kick), then enter the users name. At the top it would say what rank you have (mod, admin, co-owner, owner, or player). Kick, and mute would be useable by mod+, ban is admin+, and ipban is co-owner+. it would look a little something like this...
[img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/11.jpg[/img]

item.title: 317 staff panel
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

geel9:

Lol, it should be there. search for “setsidebarinterface” in client.java (serversided). Boom, you now no longer need to decompile a client. Now how about someone helps him with his goddamn interface, instead of being idiots?

give me couple hours to get home and ill create it.
Only thing you need to do is get me the button id’s and ill try to make codes.

Edit: here it is, took me like 10 mins to create this, but it will take several hours to create proper coding, with name enter and rights etc etc etc. . . for now i need only button id’s if you use delta pm me ill tell you what you need to do to get the ids.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 staff panel
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:7, topic:340206”][quote author=wohuynia link=topic=436575.msg3209545#msg3209545 date=1274120360]
i could do this a bit differently, for my knowledge of interface making.
I don’t know how to set up interface in to the “music tab” cause don’t know interface ID and there is no possible way for me to know it.
But i can do the interface that pops up on the screen with all the buttons, rights etc.
The only thing I’m lazy to do is “Your staff position: …”
[/quote]

You have no knowledge do you.
@alpha 0nx - You’ll need some sort of character identifcation. Whats it gonna be clcik on the character? or type the character? or IP addresses, names?[/quote]
What the fuck are you talking about? I’m not going to dig up in cache interfaces to find just one simple interface just for someone. it would be a lot better to simply create new one.
IP addresses, character identification??? seriously what the fuck are you talking about.

If you mean about buttons, then it’s easier then your no mind thinks.

Case ID:
If(rights >= 1){
other part of the code blah blah blah;
}
break;

Read full topic
